data.actual_result: Your message will be replaced with Clyde saying your were either blocked by the recipient or do not share the same server with them.
data.short_description: Changing DM settings on android a few times breaks DM'S completely
data.steps_to_repro: - Head to settings and tap "Allow server DM's from server members" 5 or 8 times. - Attempt to DM someone not on your friends list. - Make sure the setting is turned on when you message someone.
